plot: Imane, a devout Lebanese Shiite Muslim widow, uses her legal religious right of performing 'pleasure marriage' to gather blessings for her late husband, creating a lot of controversy in her conservative surroundings.
title: I Offered You Pleasure
plot_es: Imane, a devout Lebanese Shiite Muslim widow, uses her legal religious right of performing 'pleasure marriage' to gather blessings for her late husband, creating a lot of controversy in her conservative surroundings.
plot_en: Imane, a devout Lebanese Shiite Muslim widow, uses her legal religious right of performing 'pleasure marriage' to gather blessings for her late husband, creating a lot of controversy in her conservative surroundings.
